text: Armin Assinger in 2008 Armin Assinger (born 7 June 1964) is a former Austrian Alpine skier and current host of the Millionenshow and Domino Day. He competed at the 1994 Winter Olympics. Born in Graz (but growing up and living in Hermagor-Pressegger See, state Carinthia) he won a total of 4 World Cup races. == World Cup victories== {| class="wikitable" |- class="wikitable" ! Date ! Location ! title: Armin Assinger
